name: Lycanthrope, Wereotter
description: The Wereotter is a medium-sized humanoid that showcases the playful nature of otters, possessing human intelligence and capabilities. It can switch between a humanoid form, a medium otter-humanoid hybrid form, and a large otter form.
memorable: Its ability to transform shape and curse others with lycanthropy creates a unique challenge in encounters.
goals: To explore aquatic environments, engage in playful activities, and defend its territory.
relations: Often encountered with other lycanthropes or aquatic creatures.
environment: Typically found in rivers, lakes, and coastal areas.
strengths: Strong Dexterity and Charisma make it agile in combat and effective in social interactions.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to silvered weapons and has moderate Strength, making it less effective against tough foes.
attacks: Can make multiple ranged javelin attacks or a bite that curses humanoids with lycanthropy.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to change shape provides versatility in combat and social situations.
senses: Possesses keen hearing and smell, granting it advantage on Perception checks relying on those senses.
skills: A decent passive perception of 14 aids its awareness of surroundings.
additional_information: Can hold its breath for 10 minutes underwater.
Damage immunity to nonmagic attacks not made with silvered weapons.
Bite attack can curse humanoids with wereotter lycanthropy.
Exhibits agile swimming and maneuvering skills.

aquatic lycanthrope that curses with bite
